member.name: IWICMetadataWriter.RemoveValue
member.summary: Removes the metadata item that matches the given parameters.
member.param: Pointer to the metadata schema property.
Pointer to the metadata id property.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICMetadataWriter.RemoveValueByIndex
member.summary: Removes the metadata item at the specified index.
member.param: The index of the metadata item to remove.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICMetadataWriter.SetValue
member.param: Pointer to the schema property of the metadata item.
Pointer to the id property of the metadata item.
Pointer to the metadata value to set
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICMetadataWriter.SetValueByIndex
member.summary: Sets the metadata item to the specified index.
member.param: The index to place the metadata item.
Pointer to the schema property of the metadata item.
Pointer to the id property of the metadata item.
Pointer to the metadata value to set at the given index.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICMetadataWriter
member.summary: Exposes methods that provide access to writing metadata content. This is implemented by independent software vendors (ISVs) to create new metadata writers.
